Vienna.name: Innere Stadt
Vienna.description: Historic center with Stephansdom, Hofburg Palace, Ringstrasse, and luxury shopping

Vienna.name: Leopoldstadt
Vienna.description: Prater district with Ferris wheel, Karmelitermarkt, and Danube Canal

Vienna.name: Neubau
Vienna.description: Creative 7th district with MuseumsQuartier, independent boutiques, and cafes

Vienna.name: Mariahilf
Vienna.description: Shopping district with Mariahilfer Straße, Naschmarkt, and theater scene

Vienna.name: Alsergrund
Vienna.description: Academic 9th district with Sigmund Freud Museum and university buildings

Vienna.name: Wieden
Vienna.description: Residential 4th district with Belvedere Palace and Karlsplatz

Vienna.name: Hietzing
Vienna.description: Elegant 13th district with Schönbrunn Palace, zoo, and villas

Vienna.name: Döbling
Vienna.description: Wine district with Heurigen taverns, vineyards, and forested hills

Vienna.name: Favoriten
Vienna.description: Multicultural 10th district with thermal spa and diverse restaurants

Salzburg.name: Altstadt
Salzburg.description: UNESCO baroque old town with Mozart's birthplace, cathedral, and fortress

Salzburg.name: Neustadt
Salzburg.description: New town with Mirabell Gardens, shopping, and business district

Salzburg.name: Mülln
Salzburg.description: Traditional quarter with Augustinian beer hall and riverside views

Salzburg.name: Nonntal
Salzburg.description: Residential area with monastery and Hellbrunn Palace access
